SELECT page.*
FROM IsuPage page
WHERE page.orgId=#{orgId} AND page.deleted != TRUE AND page.disabled != TRUE ORDER BY page.createTime ASC

SELECT o.* FROM IsuPageTab o
WHERE o.pageId = #{id} AND o.deleted != true AND o.disabled != true
ORDER BY o.ordr ASC

SELECT o.* FROM IsuPageElement o
WHERE o.tabId = #{id} AND o.deleted != true AND o.disabled != true
ORDER BY o.ordr ASC
